biotools.summary:
VRmol: Virtual Reality for Molecular Structures. an Integrative Web-Based Virtual Reality System to Explore Macromolecular Structure.

VRmol is an easy-to-use web-based tool capable of visualizing and integratively analyzing biomolecular structures in Virtual Reality environment.

bioschemas.name: VRmol
